2025 Kansas City Royals Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 38-40, 3rd place in AL_Central (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 15.5% to make postseason, 0.2% to win World Series

Manager: Matt Quatraro (38-40)

General Manager: J.J. Picollo (Executive Vice President & GM)

Farm Director: Lonnie Goldberg

Scouting Director: Danny Ontiveros

Ballpark: Kauffman Stadium

Attendance: 814,477 (9th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 102, Pitching - 102
    One-year: Batting - 95, Pitching - 96

Pythagorean W-L: 36-42, 262 Runs, 283 Runs Allowed
